description: Returns a description of virtual tape library (VTL) devices for the specified tape gateway. In the response, Storage Gateway returns VTL device information. This operation is only supported in the tape gateway type.

parameters.name: GatewayARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

parameters.name: VTLDeviceARNs
parameters.description: An array of strings, where each string represents the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a VTL device. (string) ---

nested_items.name: GatewayARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the gateway. Use the  ListGateways operation to return a list of gateways for your account and Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: VTLDevices
nested_items.description: An array of VTL device objects composed of the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the VTL devices.

nested_items.name: VTLDeviceARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the device (tape drive or media changer).

nested_items.name: VTLDeviceType
nested_items.description: Specifies the type of device that the VTL device emulates.

nested_items.name: VTLDeviceVendor
nested_items.description: Specifies the vendor of the device that the VTL device object emulates.

nested_items.name: VTLDeviceProductIdentifier
nested_items.description: Specifies the model number of device that the VTL device emulates.

nested_items.name: DeviceiSCSIAttributes
nested_items.description: A list of iSCSI information about a VTL device.

nested_items.name: TargetARN
nested_items.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that encodes the iSCSI qualified name(iqn) of a tape drive or media changer target.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfaceId
nested_items.description: The network interface identifier of the VTL device.

nested_items.name: NetworkInterfacePort
nested_items.description: The port used to communicate with iSCSI VTL device targets.

nested_items.name: ChapEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether mutual CHAP is enabled for the iSCSI target.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An opaque string that indicates the position at which the VTL devices that were fetched for description ended. Use the marker in your next request to fetch the next set of VTL devices in the list. If there are no more VTL devices to describe, this field does not appear in the response.
